byline: Gina Martinez, Scott Tong, Stan Alcorn, Kai Ryssdal, Joanna Richards, Tim Fitzsimons and Alberta Cross
description: Airing on Friday, March 6, 2015: Another oil train derailment —this one outside Galena, Illinois. Based on the amount of oil shipped by rail, federal authorities estimate there could be a dozen of these a year or so. We look at what the U.S. will propose for greater safety and whether railroads will stop being secretive about where oil trains are running. Plus, Apple joins the Dow and AT&T gets the boot. We what the means for Dow and Apple.
title: Marketplace for Friday, March 6, 2015
